tools_tech: Java Swing or JavaFX for GUI
brief: Build a basic calculator application with features for performing arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. This project can be implemented using Java Swing or JavaFX for the graphical user interface

tools_tech: Java Swing or JavaFX for GUI
brief: Develop a simple text editor application with features for creating, opening, editing, and saving text files. This project can include basic text editing functionalities like cut, copy, paste, undo, and redo using Java Swing or JavaFX for the user interface.

tools_tech: Java Swing or JavaFX for GUI.
brief: Create a classic Tic-Tac-Toe game where two players take turns marking spaces in a 3x3 grid to achieve a winning pattern. This project can be implemented using Java Swing or JavaFX for the graphical interface and simple logic for game rules.

name: Temperature Converter
tools_tech: Java Swing or JavaFX for GUI
brief: Build a temperature converter application that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin scales. This project can be implemented using Java Swing or JavaFX for the user interface with simple conversion formulas.

name: Unit Converter:
tools_tech: Java Swing or JavaFX for GUI
brief: Develop a unit converter application that enables users to convert between different units of measurement such as length, area, volume, weight, and more. This project can be implemented using Java Swing or JavaFX for the graphical interface with predefined conversion factors.

name: Maze Solver
brief: Create a program that solves a given maze using algorithms like depth-first search (DFS) or breadth-first search (BFS). This project can be implemented as a console application where the maze is represented as a matrix, and the solution path is displayed.

name: Student Grade Calculator
brief: Develop a program that calculates students' grades based on their scores in different subjects. Users can input scores for each subject, and the program calculates the average grade and final letter grade for each student.

name: Simple Address Book
brief: Build a simple address book application that allows users to store and manage contact information such as names, phone numbers, and email addresses. This project can be implemented as a console application with basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations

name: Basic Chat Application
brief: Create a basic chat application that enables communication between two or more users over a local network. This project can be implemented using Java socket programming to establish connections and send/receive messages between clients

name: Simple Banking System
brief: Develop a simple banking system that allows users to create accounts, deposit/withdraw money, and check account balances. This project can be implemented as a console application with basic functionalities for managing bank accounts and transactions.

name: Password Manager
tools_tech: Java, JavaFX/Swing for GUI, AES encryption algorithm.
brief: The Password Manager project involves creating a secure application to manage user passwords. It includes features for storing, retrieving, and generating strong passwords. The passwords are encrypted using the AES encryption algorithm to ensure security. The user interface can be developed using JavaFX or Swing for a user-friendly experience.

name: Network Packet Sniffer
tools_tech: Java, JPCAP library for packet capture.
brief: The Network Packet Sniffer project aims to capture and analyze network packets for cybersecurity analysis. It involves using the JPCAP library to capture packets from the network interface, parsing packet headers, and extracting relevant information such as source/destination IP addresses, protocols, and payload data. This project requires a deep understanding of network protocols and packet analysis techniques.

name: Vulnerability Scanner
tools_tech: Java, OWASP ZAP API for vulnerability scanning.
brief: The Vulnerability Scanner project involves building an application to scan systems for security vulnerabilities. It utilizes the OWASP ZAP API to perform vulnerability assessments by scanning web applications for common security flaws such as cross-site scripting (XSS), SQL injection, and insecure configuration. This project requires knowledge of web application security principles and vulnerability scanning techniques.

name: Blockchain-Based Voting System
tools_tech: Java, Ethereum/Solidity for smart contracts, Web3j library for interaction with Ethereum blockchain.
brief: The Blockchain-Based Voting System project aims to create a secure and transparent voting system using blockchain technology. It involves developing smart contracts using Ethereum's Solidity language to handle the voting process and interaction with the blockchain. The Web3j library is used to communicate with the Ethereum network. This project requires expertise in blockchain development, smart contract programming, and decentralized application (DApp) deployment.

name: Cryptocurrency Wallet
tools_tech: Java, BitcoinJ library for Bitcoin, Web3j library for Ethereum.
brief: The Cryptocurrency Wallet project involves building a digital wallet application for managing cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. It includes features for creating new wallets, sending/receiving transactions, and viewing account balances. The BitcoinJ library is used for Bitcoin wallet functionalities, while the Web3j library is used for Ethereum wallet functionalities. This project requires understanding of cryptocurrency protocols, wallet management, and blockchain interaction.

name: Secure File Sharing Application
tools_tech: Java, Java Cryptography Architecture (JCA) for encryption, SSL/TLS for secure communication
brief: The Secure File Sharing Application project focuses on building a secure platform for sharing files over a network. It utilizes Java Cryptography Architecture (JCA) for file encryption to ensure data confidentiality. Secure Socket Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols are used for secure communication between clients and servers. This project requires knowledge of cryptographic algorithms, network security protocols, and secure programming practices.

name: Blockchain-Based Supply Chain Management
tools_tech: Java, Hyperledger Fabric for permissioned blockchain, Chaincode (smart contracts).
brief: The Blockchain-Based Supply Chain Management project aims to improve transparency and traceability in supply chains using blockchain technology. It involves building a permissioned blockchain network using Hyperledger Fabric and developing smart contracts (Chaincode) to record transactions and track the provenance of products. This project requires expertise in blockchain development, distributed ledger technology, and supply chain management.

name: Intrusion Detection System
tools_tech: Java, PacketCapture library for network traffic analysis, Machine Learning algorithms
brief: The Intrusion Detection System project focuses on building a system to monitor and analyze network traffic for signs of unauthorized access or malicious activities. It involves capturing network packets using the PacketCapture library, analyzing packet headers and payloads, and applying machine learning algorithms for anomaly detection. This project requires knowledge of network protocols, packet analysis techniques, and machine learning algorithms.

name: Secure Messaging Application
tools_tech: Java, Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) for encryption, SSL/TLS for secure communication.
brief: The Secure Messaging Application project focuses on building a messaging platform with end-to-end encryption to protect the confidentiality and integrity of messages. It utilizes Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) for message encryption and Secure Socket Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols for secure communication. This project requires knowledge of cryptographic algorithms, network security protocols, and secure messaging protocols

name: Fidget Spinner
brief: The logic of the game is that the turns will keep increasing as you press the space bar, and it will reduce its speed and stop at a point where you stop pressing the space bar.

name: Number guessing game
brief: Some random integer will be selected by the system and the user has to guess that integer in the minimum number of guesses

name: Word guessing game
brief: In this game, there is a list of words present, out of which our interpreter will choose 1 random word. The user first has to input their names and then, will be asked to guess any alphabet. If the random word contains that alphabet, it will be shown as the output(with correct placement) else the program will ask you to guess another alphabet.

name: Word guessing game 2
brief: In this game, the user needs to enter 5 letter word, if any alphabet is present in the magic word that word will be shown yellow and if the alphabet is present at the same position alphabet will turn green, and if the alphabet is not present in the word then alphabet will become black.

name: 21 Number game
brief: A game which progresses by counting up 1 to 21, with the player who calls 21 is eliminated. Each player can choose the amount of numbers to count on their turn between 1 to 3.

name: Mastermind Game
brief: This is a two player game. One player sets a multi digit number, then the other player tries to guess the number. If the number is not guessed correctly, then the first player reveals the digits that second player correctly guessed.

name: 2048 Game
brief: There is a 4*4 grid which can be filled with any number. Initially two random cells are filled with 2 in it. Rest cells are empty. We have to press any one of four keys to move up, down, left, or right. When we press any key, the elements of the cell move in that direction such that if any two identical numbers are contained in that particular row (in case of moving left or right) or column (in case of moving up and down) they get add up and extreme cell in that direction fill itself with that number and rest cells goes empty again. After this grid compression any random empty cell gets itself filled with 2. Following this process we have to double the elements by adding up and make 2048 in any of the cell. If we are able to do that we wins. But if during the game there is no empty cell left to be filled with a new 2, then the game goes over.

name: Simple FLAMES game
brief: FLAMES is a popular game named after the acronym: Friends, Lovers, Affectionate, Marriage, Enemies, Sibling. Take two names. Remove the common characters with their respective common occurrences. Get the count of the characters that are left. Take FLAMES letters as [F, L, A, M, E, S]. Start removing letter using the count we got. The letter which lasts the process is the result.

name: Pokmon Training Game
brief: You are a Pokmon trainer. Each Pokmon has its own power, described by a positive integer value. As you travel, you watch Pokmon and you catch each of them. After each catch, you have to display maximum and minimum powers of Pokmon caught so far.

name: Rock Paper Scissor game
brief: In this game, the user gets the first chance to pick the option between Rock, paper, and scissors. After the computer select from the remaining two choices(randomly), the winner is decided as per the rules.

name: Cows and Bulls game
brief: A player will create a secret code, usually a 4-digit number. This number should have no repeated digits. Another player makes a guess (4 digit number) to crack the secret number. Upon making a guess, 2 hints will be provided- Cows and Bulls. Bulls indicate the number of correct digits in the correct position and cows indicates the number of correct digits in the wrong position. The player keeps on guessing until the secret code is cracked. The player who guesses in the minimum number of tries wins.

name: Higher-Lower Game
brief: The name of some Instagram accounts will be displayed, you have to guess which has a higher number of followers by typing in the name of that account. Make sure you type the name exactly as shown. If the answer is correct, one of the accounts will stay, and some other account will be displayed to compare to.

name: Tic Tac Toe
brief: In this game a player can choose between two symbols with his opponent, the usual games use X and O. If the first player chooses X, then the second player must play with O and vice versa. Aim is to create a straight line horizontally or vertically or diagonally

name: Sudoku Game
brief: Sudoku is a logic-based, combinatorial number-placement puzzle. The objective is to fill a 99 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 33 subgrids that compose the grid contain all of the digits from 1 to 9.

name: Pong Game
brief: Develop a simple Pong game where players control paddles to hit a ball back and forth across the screen.
